name: Nimbora Staked Starknet
description: Nimbora is a Starknet-based infrastructure enabling users to earn on Layer 1 protocols with significantly reduced costs. Powered by the innovative minds at the SpaceShard team, we leverage Starknet ZK Rollup to provide cost-effective DeFi strategies without compromising security or trust. We have built LST of STRK. When you stake your STRK tokens on Nimbora, you receive sSTRK in return. The sSTRK token reflects your staked position on Nimbora and acts as a claim on your original STRK.
